thread.title: Kylie Minogue paid $10,000 for Joshua Sasse's hair plugs | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue paid $10,000 for Joshua Sasse's hair plugs | Daily Mail Online

author: Josh Hanrahan
title: Kylie Minogue paid $10,000 for Joshua Sasse's hair plugs | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 265 shares 'It wasn't like he was trying to force money out of her. She really wanted this one to work. 'She paid for his hair extensions. He got the plugs put in. That's the ultimate sign of love and dedication and she's been rewarded like this.' Revealed: 'She paid for his hair extensions. He got the plugs put in,' family friend Peter Ford told Kyle and Jackie O on Sydney radio on Monday Any change? Kylie was said to be deeply smitten with her beau and paid the large sum in what Ford called: 'The ultimate sign of love and dedication' News of Minogue and Sasse's split came almost exactly one year after the pair had announced their engagement. The singer and former Neighbours star began dating the 29-year-old in November last year and was said to be deeply smitten with her beau. However Ford told Kyle and Jackie O their breakup was being 'celebrated' by Kylie's loved ones, who thought he was 'bad news' and a 'bulls**t artist'. 'They're celebrating! They're thrilled! He was bad news,' the veteran entertainment reporter said Wrong for her? Kylie Minogue's loved ones are 'celebrating' her split with Joshua Sasse because they thought he was 'bad news' and a 'b t artist,' family friend Peter Ford revealed Not fans: Speaking to Kyle Sandilands and Jackie O on KIIS 1065 morning show, the entertainment reporter said, 'They're celebrating! They're thrilled! He was bad news' Ford revealed Kylie's younger sister Dannii in particular was not a fan of the British actor. 'Relief is the word. They always had concerns. Dannii is like a sniffer dog. She can suss out a bulls**t artist anywhere and she did not like him,' Peter said. The couple's engagement is said to have ended over rumours that Joshua had gotten close to actress Marta Milan. While Peter admitted Kylie saw the Spanish star as a 'concern' he doesn't believe that Joshua cheated and revealed that Kylie and Joshua in fact split before Christmas. Sisterly love: Peter, who is said to know the Minogue family, revealed Kylie's younger sister Dannii in particular was not a fan of the British actor and considered him a 'b t artist' Hairy situation: The 48-year-old singer came to the rescue when her much younger fiance began losing his hair. 'She paid for his hair extensions. He got the plugs put in. That's the ultimate sign of love and dedication and she's been rewarded like this,' Peter said Too close? The engagement is said to have ended over rumours that Joshua had gotten close to actress Marta Milan 'I don't think so. That was part of her concerns, but it's been off for a while. It's been off since before Christmas. He's had to go home to live with mum and dad,' he said. Peter believes that Kylie's split was a small mercy as a divorce between the pair down the line would have been 'messy'. He told Kyle and Jackie, 'Thank god this didn't end up in a marriage. It would have been much messier and nastier.' Relieved: Peter told Kylie and Jackie, 'Thank god this didn't end up in a marriage. It would have been much messier and nastier' Read more: Share or comment on this article 265
